comment: Awful. She has SO much attitude towards her students. Her feedback is not clear, and shes a tough grader if you dont do the paper to her exact standards. Everything she taught was to write one paper, so I learned almost nothing. Dont take her at all.

Very open minded professor and doesn't mind communicating. Not a bad course load but you will work a little. Usual discussion every week and small assignment between that builds towards writing your final paper. She made me rewrite my body 3 times. Got a 95 on the final. Ended the class with an 88.95 Recommend taking her.

Dr. Medina is a tough grader, but she gives such thorough feedback that it is impossible to receive anything less than an A in the class. Discussions every week, 5 quizzes total, and you write the different parts of the final paper throughout the year and piece it all together to form your final paper at the end. Solid choice.

Her class is awful and the things we do just lead up to one big paper. Feels like we learn nothing and Im just making up things weekly. Do not recommend I know there are easier and better professors at KSU to teach this.

Honestly, where do I even begin. This is an intro, basic, 2000 level class and this woman grades it like it's a senior seminar. Very poor feedback for all assignments. Her content is boring. I have upper level, 3000 classes, for communications and PR and they aren't nearly as meticulous or hard as this class. Please save yourself, don't take her.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--So many papers--Tough grader

comment: This professor does not want her students to succeed at all. She is one of the toughest graders Ive ever had, and her feedback doesnt help at all. I ended the class with an 89.9, and she gave me a B. Professors are meant to help their students succeed to the best of their ability, but I guess no one ever taught her that.

Gives poor feedback and instructions. There is a discussion post every week that is not easy but not horrible. The only grades are the discussion posts and the paper you spend the whole semester writing. The paper counts for a lot more than the discussion posts so if you don't do well on the paper you are screwed. And she doesn't tell you whats bad

She wont let you get away with careless errors, but taking her class will improve your writing very quickly. She grades quickly and will usually respond to emails within a day or two. She is more than happy to clarify any questions or concerns you might have and help you along the way. She wants you to succeed and will work with you. Take her!

she was amazing! it started out tough, but she ended up giving us chances to turn in drafts before the final papers which helped soo much. theres a discussion every week, 5 quizzes with lowest dropped, and the rest is writing a lit review. make sure she knows you care. she is so helpful and cares so much. take her take her take her!!!!!!!!!!!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria
